description: The 2 back gets the ball and runs to the 8 hole. The 3 and 4 backs make blocks. After handing off, the 1 back fake runs to opposite play side.

rules.name: last_outside
rules.description: Block the last man outside, on the playside.

rules.name: second_outside
rules.description: Block the second-to-last man outside, on the playside.
